alert.note: Alert for Grant; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 7:54PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A thunderstorm with strong gusty winds will impact portions of southwestern Cherry and northeastern Grant Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 654 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with strong gusty winds 8 miles north of Ashby, or 40 miles north of Arthur, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Whitman, Whitman Road crossing the North Branch of the Middle Loup River, Duluth, Dipping Vat Meadow and Mother Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 152 and 160. Highway 61 between mile markers 161 and 176. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
